name: ARCamera.TrackingState
desc: Values for position tracking quality, with possible causes when tracking quality is limited.

items.name: case notAvailable
items.desc: Camera position tracking is not available.

items.name: case limited(ARCamera.TrackingState.Reason)
items.desc: Tracking is available, but the quality of results is questionable.

items.name: case normal
items.desc: Camera position tracking is providing optimal results.
